summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1664, for the improvement of Depot Street, from "A" Street, to "F" Street, and Depot Street produced as therein named, all in the City of Seattle by grading and planking the same, under Ordinance No. 17556 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
